description: Join a captivating journey through the City of London with our exclusive Muslim Heritage Tour. Discover the deep connections of Salahuddin Ayubi and marvel at the UK's oldest Muslim statues, dating back 1000 years. Uncover the legacy of England’s most famous Middle Eastern immigrant and delve into fascinating tales of crime and health in history.

events.name: Muslim Heritage of the City walk
Muslim Heritage of the City walk

factsheet.heading: Muslim Heritage of the City tour
paragraphs: Join a captivating journey through the City of London with our exclusive Muslim Heritage Tour! Discover the deep connections of Salahuddin Ayubi and marvel at the UK's oldest Muslim statues, dating back 1000 years.
Uncover the legacy of England’s most famous Middle Eastern immigrant and delve into fascinating tales of crime and health in history.

Learn about Muhammadun Berry and Duse Muhammad Ali, a pioneering black Muslim who launched Britain’s first black newspaper over a century ago. Visit a unique church with three Ottoman heads and explore the Muslim influence in the construction of the iconic St Paul’s Cathedral. Hear more about the performance of a public Muslim call to prayer  (Adthan) being performed in the 1960s.

Conclude the adventure at an extraordinary listed building that withstood two World Wars and modern development. Join us for an unforgettable experience that celebrates the rich Muslim heritage woven into the fabric of the City of London’s history.

travel_info: Additional travel info: There is only one entrance/exit at Temple tube. Our guide will have a sign and his signature red fez.

name: Muslim Heritage of the City tour
